name: RestaurantEstablishmentType
title: Restaurant Establishment Type Cd
description: Restaurant Establishment codes for insurance operations.

concept.definition: A restaurant where customers are seated and served meals at tables within the establishment.
A dining establishment where waitstaff take orders and deliver food to customers seated at tables.
A casual establishment primarily serving coffee, tea, and light refreshments.
A mobile vending cart specifically designed for selling hot dogs and related items.
A wheeled vehicle from which food is sold on the street or at events.
A motorized vehicle equipped to serve pre-prepared food without on-site cooking facilities.

designation.value: Camion de Cuisine Mobile sans Cuisson
Camión de Comida Móvil sin Cocina

concept.definition: A motorized vehicle equipped with cooking equipment to prepare and serve food on-site.

designation.value: Camion de Cuisine Mobile avec Cuisson
Camión de Comida Móvil con Cocina

concept.definition: A food service counter or kiosk located within a shopping mall food court or common area.

designation.value: Mostrador de Comida de Centro Comercial

concept.definition: A quick-service restaurant where food is prepared and served rapidly with minimal table service.
A food establishment that prepares food exclusively for customers to take away, with no dine-in seating.
A food service operation that prepares and delivers meals to off-site locations for events and functions.
A restaurant where food is displayed on tables and customers serve themselves.
